nodes.bodyText: Are you sure this works? It seems like it should but when I try tso listcat | grep JENKINS manually, it doesn't find anything although there is a dataset there.

Trying something else tso listcat | tee out outputs garbage, making me thing there is a ascii/ebcdic issue.
tso listcat > out && grep JENKINS out works.
Actually sh -c "tso listcat | grep JENKINS" works, so I guess this will too.
